mapper.select: SELECT NUM, APPROACH, REGIST_DATE, PROJECT_NUM, USER_NUM FROM TBL_APPLY WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND APPROACH ='2'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_APPLY (NUM, REGIST_DATE, APPROACH, PROJECT_NUM, USER_NUM) VALUES(SEQ_APPLY.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE,NULL, #{projectNum}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT TBL_PROJECT.POINT AS POINT,TBL_USER.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME,TBL_PROJECT.NUM AS PROJECTNUM,TBL_APPLY.NUM AS NUM,TBL_APPLY.APPROACH AS APPROACH,TBL_USER.NUM AS userNum,TBL_PROJECT.STARTTIME AS startTime ,TBL_PROJECT.ENDTIME AS endTime, TBL_USER.PHONE AS PHONE,TBL_PROJECT.TERRAIN AS TERRAIN,TBL_PROJECT.COURSE AS COURSE,TBL_PROJECT.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_PROJECT,TBL_APPLY,TBL_USER WHERE TBL_PROJECT.NUM = TBL_APPLY.PROJECT_NUM AND TBL_USER.NUM = TBL_APPLY.USER_NUM AND TBL_PROJECT.NUM =#{projectNum}
